title: Selections from the Christmas Oratorio by J.S. Bach
creator_credit: David Bairstow, Peter Jones and ONF | NFB
brief_description: The Montreal Bach Choir under the direction of George Little has sung in many countries. This film presents the choir in one of its most distinguished performances with guest soloists Elizabeth Benson Guy, soprano; Maureen Forrester, contralto; Glenn Schnittke, tenor; Jan Simons, bass; James Ranti, trumpet; and Calvin Sieb, concertmaster.
